channel.title: Compiling error else without if

item.title: Compiling error else without if
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

case 21233: // Thick Skin
if(playerLevel[5] >= 20);{
SummonNewNPC(1655);
animation2(84, absY-1, absX);
sendMessage(“You summon a crawling hand!”);
addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[4]), 5);
}else{
sendMessage(“You need a summoning level of 20 to summon a crawling hand”);
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error else without if

item.description:
@hybanks2000 wrote:

this is my code
case 21233: // Thick Skin
if(playerLevel[5] >= 20);
SummonNewNPC(1655);
animation2(84, absY-1, absX);
sendMessage(“You summon a crawling hand!”);
addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[4]), 5);
else
sendMessage(“You need a summoning level of 20 to summon a crawling hand”);

break;

this is my error
client.java:22551: ‘else’ without ‘if’

Press any key to continue . . .
